story: In a cozy corner of a sunlit house, there lives a gentle cat named Ivy, her massive eyes gleaming with curiosity
Through the crystal-clear windows, she watches the world outside, her enormous eyeballs tracking every flutter and movement
Birds dance through the air like tiny acrobats, while squirrels perform their daily circus on the branches outside
Despite her predatory equipment - those massive, all-seeing eyes - Ivy remains the gentlest of souls, never raising a paw in anger
When birds land on the windowsill, she simply watches, her giant eyes growing even larger with fascination
Sometimes, she attempts to catch flying cards tossed by her humans, her enormous eyes calculating trajectories with mathematical precision
But most often, Ivy can be found sprawled on the floor, completely inert, like a furry puddle with two massive headlights
In these moments of stillness, she seems to transcend the normal laws of cat physics, becoming one with the carpet
As evening approaches, Ivy's humans call her for dinner, and those enormous eyes lock onto the sound of kibble hitting her bowl
And so ends another day in Ivy's life, as she trots obediently to her humans, proving that even the most equipped predator can choose to be the gentlest of souls
title: Ivy's Gentle Watch

background_music.prompt: gentle, playful piano music with a hint of whimsy
